name: Lili
title: The Agile Acrobat
subtitle: A graceful fighter who combines acrobatics with devastating martial arts
lore: The only daughter of a wealthy oil magnate, Lili has trained extensively in various martial arts and acrobatics. Her refined upbringing belies her fierce fighting spirit and mastery of graceful yet deadly combat techniques. Using her agility and precise strikes, she dances through battle with elegant yet lethal efficiency.

passive.name: Agile Acrobat
passive.description: Dashing, Flashing, or Jumping reduces Lili's abilities cooldowns by 1s and grants her [5/12/16/24/30 AD] for 10 seconds.

Q.name: Jump Kick
Q.description: Lili jumps in the selected direction, kicking forward with her leg. If she hits an enemy, she deals [100% AD] damage.

W.name: Gap-close
W.description: Lili dashes back from a selected nearby enemy and then leaps back to her original position.

E.name: Peacock Stance
E.description: Lili becomes immune to all damage and crowd control effects for [1s]. If she is hit during this time, she can dash in any direction for [1s].

R.name: Execute Kick
R.description: Lili deals massive [35% MAX HP] true damage to a selected nearby enemy. If the enemy has more than 8200 MAX HP, the damage increases to [50% MAX HP].

1.name: Flashing Acrobat
1.description: Dashing or jumping also cleanses Lili of any negative debuffs (slow, root, poison).

1.name: Agile Assault
1.description: When Lili uses a dash, her next auto-attack deals an additional 20% AD as bonus magical damage.

5.name: Evasive Maneuvers
5.description: Peacock Stance duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

5.name: High Velocity Kicks
5.description: Jump Kick gains a 20% range increase and 15% movement speed boost for 2 seconds after landing.

5.name: Flurry of Strikes
5.description: After using Jump Kick, Lili's attack speed is increased by 20% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Killer Instinct
10.description: Execute Kick charms the enemy if it survives for [1s].

10.name: Relentless Kick
10.description: If Execute Kick kills the target, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

15.name: Impenetrable Stance
15.description: Peacock Stance now grants [10% total damage reduction] to Lili when the duration ends.

15.name: Reckless Jumps
15.description: Jump Kick refunds 25% of the cooldown if it hits an enemy.

15.name: Graceful Strike
15.description: After using Jump Kick, Lili gains 30% increased movement speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Untouchable
20.description: Peacock Stance grants a shield equal to 10% of Lili's maximum HP after the immunity period ends.

20.name: Lethal Acrobat
20.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns by 30% if Lili uses Execute Kick on a target with less than 50% HP.

20.name: Endless Dance
20.description: After using Gap-close, Lili can use it again within 2 seconds without triggering the cooldown.

20.name: Fatal Finish
20.description: Execute Kick now deals an additional 15% true damage to all enemies in a small area around the primary target.
